name: Classic Cars Simulator 3d 2015: Old Cars sim with extream speeding and city racing
name_original: Classic Cars Simulator 3d 2015: Old Cars sim with extream speeding and city racing
description:
Classic Cars Simulator 3D is a old school sportscar racing game in which you choose between classic car race and stunts mode.

If you enjoy driving old school cars like Ferrari, Porsche, Corvette, Supra or any other vintage car (Volkswagen Golf) this hot rod cars sim is for You.
You will race through the streets of California / Los Angeles (capital of hot rod cars) like owner of American muscle wagon like Ford GT, Chevrolet Camaro, Mustang Shelby or like member of classic car club.

When you need for speed with no limits of driving fast and furious in the city doing sideways drifting and if You are city AMC maniac you will surely have fun after you download this race game.

Our next car game is all about old rod automobile and automotive in general. You can do whatever you want with your car, including: drag race on the highway, acceleration test, drift using handbrake or illegal race (don't be afraid of speeding ticket).

In this game of motorsports 6 first car points you will get easily, we wish you lack collecting the rest.

Race for victory in age of racing starting from 2015 in international race time leaderboards. You will see how fast you can get among other retro cars repair and tuning maniacs from all around the world.
While driving in this world of speed you will explore the streets without any traffic, fast roads and highways of great speed. Btw feel free and practice your classic car parking skills but don’t crash your car because you will have to fix it in garage.
Feel the wealth and luxury as a rich man in your sportcar.
Let’s RUSH!
